summary: The 'More Behavioral Health Providers Act of 2025' aims to increase access to mental health and substance use disorder services under Medicare. It expands eligibility for financial incentives to practitioners in shortage areas, increasing payments for mental health services to 15% (up from 10% for other physician services in shortage areas).  It defines 'specified health services' and 'applicable practitioner' to clarify who is eligible for these increased payments.
